name: The Throne
description:
CONTROLS:

Character Movement: WASD.

Camera Pan: Left mouse and hold or num pad 7 and 9.

Camera Elevation: num pad 1 and 3.

Camera Zoom: Mouse wheel.

Description:  Reach the throne to win.  Too much light, shadow, zero health, or fall, and you die.  Navigate the light, and shadow sprites through the ramparts to victory.
